title: Bethenny Frankel puts cleavage on full display in a low-cut black pantsuit
text:
They started dating in 2018.

And Bethenny Frankel and Paul Bernon proved they're still going strong as a couple as they attended a wedding together in Boston wearing coordinated jet-black outfits.

The 48-year-old Real Housewives of New York star made a dramatic statement in a low-cut pantsuit with a choker neckline and flared bottoms.

Sharp: Bethenny Frankel and Paul Bernon proved they're still going strong as a couple as they attended a wedding together in Boston wearing coordinated jet-black outfits

She paired the look with a black crossbody bag that featured silver studs, a silver wristwatch and a gold bangle.

The Skinnygirl founder also added gold hoops to pump up the look as well as some chunky rings.

Bethenny's eyes were finished off with a smokey look and she kept her lip color minimal with a swipe of clear gloss.

Selfie! The 48-year-old Real Housewives of New York star made a dramatic statement in a low-cut pantsuit with a choker neckline and flared bottoms

Sleek: She paired the look with a black crossbody bag that featured silver studs, a silver wristwatch and a gold bangle

Coupled: The Skinnygirl founder also added gold hoops to pump up the look as well as some chunky rings

Her film producer paramour went classic with a black suit and tie with a powder blue shirt underneath.

'Love is in the air,' she captioned the photo that garnered over 49K likes in its first two hours of posting.

Their outing comes about two weeks after Frankel made the rumor mill go wild with a photo of herself and her daughter in which she seems to sport a massive diamond ring on just the right finger.

What's that? Their outing comes about two weeks after Frankel made the rumor mill go wild with a photo of herself and her daughter in which she seems to sport a massive diamond ring on just the right finger

The photo was posted to Instagram in honor of National Daughter Day, but her followers chose to focus on the significance of that shiny rock.

'but can we talk about what’s that bling on THAT finger???' one commenter wrote.

'Are you engaged?? Omg,' another said.

Questions: The photo was posted to Instagram in honor of National Daughter Day, but her followers chose to focus on the significance of that shiny rock

'Beautiful pic but is that an engagement ring I spy?' another commenter wrote.

Frankel did not respond to any of the commenters, but a source tells People that the ring is just a part of her own stash.

'She’s not engaged,' the source said. 'She has an amazing jewelry closet.'

Celebrate: The two just celebrated their one-year anniversary last month

The two just celebrated their one-year anniversary last month.

'Having such a supportive and loving partner makes me a better person & inspires me to achieve the impossible,' she captioned an Instagram photo of them both on the big day.

'Happy Anniversary! I love you and thank you for the most beautiful year!'
description: They started dating in 2018. And Bethenny Frankel and Paul Bernon proved they're still going strong as a couple as they attended a wedding together in Boston wearing coordinated
